channel.title: circle on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in circle on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great mens circle tonight
item.description: 22:50 Tuesday 14 August 2018 JST Four men in the circle tonight, including two relatively newcomers. I experienced beautiful facilitation to help me get the courage to implement my new idea. I have just sent this message to my friend H. I am thinking about doing a 6 month set of weekly circles on Friday nights. Could I do them at your place? Would you be able to attend, assuming you'd be interested in the content?

item.title: new man in mens circle last night
item.description: 07:03 Wednesday 04 April 2018 JST Nice synchronicity brought two old friends together on the train just in time for one to invite the other two men’s group last night, the first Tuesday of the month, when new men are welcome to join. Six men in the circle last night. Good strong container in which we did a lot of good work.
